sentences.english: More than 10 back words every day, and write.
sentences.chinese: 每天背單詞10個以上，並且默寫。

sentences.english: She had no time to write down the content from memory tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她沒有時間再進行默寫了。

sentences.english: Sir, must we write the diction every other line?
sentences.chinese: 老師，默寫必須每隔一行寫嗎？

sentences.english: Then she wrote down the content from memory.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她把內容默寫了一遍。

sentences.english: The tutor question his pupils to learn the poem by Listent.
sentences.chinese: 老師要求他的學生要默寫這首詩。

sentences.english: The teacher gave us two French dictations today.
sentences.chinese: 老師今天給我們做了兩次法文默寫測驗。

sentences.english: Everybody please take out a piece of paper and write the periodic table from memory.
sentences.chinese: 請大家拿出一張紙，默寫化學元素週期表。

sentences.english: After the exit to read 3000 words dictation.
sentences.chinese: 出關後要能讀說默寫出3000個單詞。

sentences.english: He has an excellent memory, and can write the text from memory.
sentences.chinese: 記憶力真是太好了，默寫的內容與原文毫分不差。

sentences.english: You will be asked to write down the periodic table.
English teacher told our writing from memory.
Write the Bible passages, from memory if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如可能，請默寫聖經章節。

definition: to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
to be strongly determined to succeed (idiom)
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
